    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static void load(com.badlogic.androidgames.framework.impl.GLGame game)
        Creates all the Texture and TextureRegion, Sound and Music objects
        Parameters:
        game - The Game instance to which the assets belong

      • reload

        public static void reload()
        Reloads all textures and plays music (if sound enabled). Used when OpenGL context is lost

      • playSound

        public static void playSound(com.badlogic.androidgames.framework.Sound sound)
        Plays the sound if sound is enabled in Settings, otherwise does nothing
        Parameters:
        sound - The Sound object to play
